actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The degenerate titan makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Earthstrike (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The degenerate titan slams his fists onto the ground, creating a shockwave in a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line takes 35 (10d6) force damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the titan and knocked prone; a successful DC 18 Dexterity saving throw halves the damage and prevents the creature from being flung or knocked prone. A creature that's flung against an unyielding object such as a wall or floor takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If it collides with another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage (1d6 bludgeoning per 10 feet) and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Shout of the Void (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The degenerate titan utters a scream that rends reality in a 30-foot cone. Any ongoing spell or magical effect of 3rd level or lower in the area ends. For every spell or effect of 4th level or higher in the area, the degenerate titan makes a Constitution check against DC (10 + the level of the spell or effect). On a success, the spell or effect ends.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The degenerate titan has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

monsters.name: Dune Mimic
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 14

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dune mimic makes four pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the dune mimic is in object or terrain form, the target is subjected to the mimic's Adhesive trait.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The dune mimic engulfs all creatures it has grappled. An engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, is no longer grappled, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the dune mimic, and takes 18 (4d8) acid damage at the start of each of the dune mimic's turns. When the dune mimic moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 15 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the dune mimic.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The dune mimic can use its action to polymorph into a Huge object or terrain feature (maximum area 25 x 25 feet) or back into its true, amorphous form. Since its coating of dust, sand, and gravel can't be hidden, it usually disguises itself as a terrain feature or eroded ruin. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Adhesive (Object or Terrain Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The dune mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A creature adhered to the dune mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 15). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage. The dune mimic can harden its outer surface, so only the creatures it chooses are affected by this trait.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Object or Terrain Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: While the dune mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object or terrain feature.

special_abilities.name: Grappler
special_abilities.desc: The dune mimic has advantage on attack rolls against a creature grappled by it.

monsters.name: Savager
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The savager makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 38 (5d12 + 6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Mighty Swing
special_abilities.desc: When a savager attacks without moving during its turn, it makes its claw attack with advantage.

special_abilities.name: Quills
special_abilities.desc: A creature takes 4 (1d8) piercing damage at the start of its turn while it is grappling a savager.
